clothe.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to put clothes on your body
clothe.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The children lay on the bed, fully clothed and fast asleep.
The King was clothed in a purple gown.
clothe.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to provide clothes for yourself or other people
clothe.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: They could barely keep the family fed and clothed.
